#summary This object level method saves itself to the database and returns true or false depending on if the save succeeded or not.

If the object's primary key matches one in the database the contents of that row will be updated. If not, a new row will be inserted.

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| This method takes no arguments || || || || ||

See the sections on [CreatingNewRows] and [UpdatingExistingRows] for more information and code examples.
